title: NFS Undercover
description: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB) This game supports English, Spanish, and French. Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual". You never thought it would turn out like this: an all-out chase where you're the hunted - and the hunter! Get behind the wheel and risk everything to infiltrate a ruthless international crime syndicate. It will take all of your experience - and every ounce of skill - to outrun the law, take down the enemy and unlock the truth that puts an end to this chase once and for all. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

contentRating.label: T (Teen)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: Aftermarket Body Kit Package
childDownloads.description: Get instant access to all aftermarket body kit packages. Note: items in this package can be unlocked without purchase by progressing through Career. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Aftermarket Hoods, Spoilers & Exhaust Package
childDownloads.description: Get instant access to all aftermarket hood, spoiler and exhaust packages. Note: items in this package can be unlocked without purchase by progressing through Career. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Aftermarket Wheels Package
childDownloads.description: Get instant access to all aftermarket wheel packages. Note: items in this package can be unlocked without purchase by progressing through Career. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Boss Car Bundle
childDownloads.description: Blow away your competition with this explosive car pack, featuring eight unique boss cars available for use in any online race or offline career event. Race your way to the top of the leaderboards with each of these cars: Carmen's Shelby GT500, Chase’s BMW M6, Chau Wu’s  Mercedes-Benz CLS 63 AMG, G-Mac’s Lamborghini Gallardo LP560-4 , Hector’s Nissan 370Z (Z34), Nickel’s Dodge Viper SRT10, Rose’s Porsche 911 GT2 and Zack’s Volkswagen Scirocco. Find out more at needforspeed.com. NOTE: The free Challenge Series Upgrade is required (separate download) in order for these cars to be used. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Challenge Series Expansion
childDownloads.description: Think you've mastered the world of Undercover? Think again. This huge upgrade offers 60 new events, including two new game modes (highway wars and highway checkpoint) where you'll have the ability to earn up to three new cars as you race your way through hair-raising traffic. Best of all, this content is absolutely free! Find out more at needforspeed.com.

childDownloads.title: Collector's Edition Upgrade
childDownloads.description: Take your experience to the next level with the Need for Speed Undercover Collector’s Edition. This digital upgrade includes five brand new cars available for use in career mode (2006 Koeniggsigg CCX, 2006 Dodge Challenger Concept, 2007 Porsche Cayman S, 2007 BMW Z4 M, 2007 Mercedes SL 65 AMG) plus twelve new circuit, sprint and checkpoint track configurations. Also included are specially tuned versions of ten existing cars which are available in quick race & online modes, plus 35 exclusive vinyls for adding a unique visual style to any of your cars. Visit needforspeed.com for screenshots and more details. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Exotic Car Bundle
childDownloads.description: Get immediate access to this package of exotic cars, including the 2006 Porsche 911 Turbo, 2007 Mercedes-Benz McLaren SLR 722, 2006 Ford GT, 2008 Audi R8, 2009 Lamborghini Gallardo LP 560 and 2006 Aston Martin DB9. Note: all cars in this package can be unlocked without purchase by progressing through Career. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Launch Trailer
childDownloads.description: Download the launch trailer for Need for Speed Undercover, coming to stores in November 2008! Visit needforspeed.com for more info.

childDownloads.title: Maggie Q Theme
childDownloads.description: Update your dashboard with this Need for Speed Undercover theme featuring Maggie Q, designed for the New Xbox Experience! NFS Undercover is in stores now – find out more at www.needforspeed.com. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

Note: all cars in this package can be unlocked without purchase by progressing through Career. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
